PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Allows loading blueprints of multiple sub-grids into projectors and welding them.
PluginData.Description:
This plugin allows to load blueprints of multiple sub-grids into projectors and welding the blocks. Head/base blocks are added automatically as needed to connect subgrids.
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
Please consider supporting my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/semods
One time support via PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/vferenczi/
Thank you!
